title: A learned discourse of ceremonies retained and used in Christian churches. Written by the Right Reverend Father in God Lancelot Andrews late Bishop of Winchester a little before his death: at the request of an eminent person that desired satisfaction therein. Printed by the original copy written with his own hand, ex pede Hercules.
author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.
publisher: Printed for Charles Adams, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Talbot near St Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,
notes: Editor's note "To the reader" signed: Edward Leigh.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
